website_summaries.verdict: Stylish curved faucet with a two-handle design in a pleasing chrome finish.
pros: Spout rotates and arcs far from the wall to give you a good level of accessibility
Handles have a design that's easy to grip
Good price point for this style of faucet
Manufacturer backs this faucet with a lifetime limited warranty to give you peace of mind
cons: Materials don't appear to be of the highest quality, so it may not last

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE: MORE PROBLEMS!
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, seems to function well, BUT less than 6 mos after purchase, cold water handle seems stripped..I am so disappointed. UPDATE: at just little more than 7mos later an inner seal(plastic) cracked and the faucet began leaking..this is a machined part and is not replaceable..I now need a new faucet..this is a piece of JUNK..Do not waste your $ or time..looks aren't everything.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice faucet for farmhouse sink
customer_reviews.text: Good looking faucet, easy to install and adjust to the exact spacing of our wall mount holes in farmhouse sink. The handles are not quite as solid when used as I would like (we initially tried a beautiful Kingston Brass...it was too big but you could really feel the higher quality difference). Was unclear if this model was Delta brand or not...after no Delta logo on anything in the packaging looked it up and Peerless is it's own brand "backed by Delta". Overall looks awesome and are happy with the price. Not too many to choose from for wall mounts!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Carter

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a much more expensive faucet
customer_reviews.text: We got this for a commercial sink in our basement, but I would be happy putting this faucet anywhere. It's well-made and has design details that make it look like a much more expensive faucet. The arc is perfect for the basement sink. We took off the end of the faucet and attached a small couple so that we could attach a hose to the faucet and it works great. It is not easy to find wall-mounted bridge faucets at this price point that look anywhere near this nice. I would happily put a faucet like this anywhere in my house... and I am very design-oriented.
customer_reviews.author: Curious EpicureTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Be warned, relax, very low stress installation.
customer_reviews.text: Style, function and ease of installation all superb. Only wish the enclosed product description and installation advice had been less abbreviated. I installed the faucet more easily than I believed possible. The replacement faucet was successfully installed in less than 15 minutes, requiring only a 12 inch and 10 inch crescent wrench. It came fully assembled in the box, with the two needed washers. Would buy another one, if needed, and would recommend faucet on basis of quality, design, appearance and price. Have only had it in use for a day, but it clearly works much better than one I put in years ago, from a different manufacturer, and at two thirds of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Oxelson

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware, Look Elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Did the other reviewers actually use this product?!? I admit it looks nice but the quality is just not there. The valve handles continually become loose because the valve bodies they screw into are plastic. The swiveling faucet assembly is too loose and can not be tightened straight out of the box. My instinct was to return it after installing but it was an emergency fix... Now the return window has closed and I'll have to find something else. Shouldn't it last more than two months? Don't waste your time or money on this faucet, you (don't) get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: I like this product fine
customer_reviews.text: I like this product fine, it does the job. The cold and hot knobs don't have a tight fit and are a bit wobbly. They don't affect the functionality, but I've had this type faucet before and all the parts fit tight and firm. The other think I noticed was when turning water off with either cold/hot, there's a slight delay, unlike other faucets where the water stops immediately upon turning the know. Wall mounted faucets are not easy to find; my comments are so that future buyers are aware, but it functions well.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's good for the price. Peddling is smooth and noiseless. Like in other reviews the handle bars are too low and far away. Easy to put together and stable when using it This will work for me but if you need to hold on to the handle bars for long time look for some thing different
customer_reviews.author: Gary C

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you want
customer_reviews.text: This faucet had all the features I was looking for ... replaceable valve cartridges ... heavy brass construction ... pipe-fitting sockets (FPT) ... beautiful appearance ... and less expensive than many competitors. It's not a water-saver style ... at least with a garden hose connector on the spout instead of the aerator, it flows hard and heavy ... even with 1/2" hoses for the hook-up which have maybe a quarter inch clear bore. Really strong flow. I am entirely pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Roaster

customer_reviews.title: You might have to put in a female-to-male adapter, but no sweat
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace a wall-mount faucet that's probably older than I am, and I ain't young. When I removed the old faucet, it revealed that it used a male-to-female connection which of course wouldn't work with this Peerless female-to-male connection. I put on a close male-male connector with Teflon tape, put on the new faucet, and I was done in no time at all. I would advise popping off the H/C top caps (they remove with just good fingernails) and tightening the screws holding the faucet covers on so that they fit snugly. I've only had it a few days but so far no leaks and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: V. Alan White

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: I knew it would be shinier than I really wanted, and it is, but I don't care any more. It's solid, easy to install, and comfortable to use. My husband insisted on separate hot and cold handles so that narrowed the field. I'm very happy I found this faucet. I was afraid the fixture would stick out too far from the wall, and the faucet too far beyond that, but it's fine. I don't have or want a separate sprayer at that sink, so I added a small swivel sprayer spout and it's perfect. Together with the range of the faucet, I can clean all corners of the sink.
customer_reviews.author: j.r.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT utility sink faucet!
customer_reviews.text: The previous owner of my house had rigid hose connected to the water connections over the laundry room utility sink. They were ridiculous to use. We pulled the hose and faucets off the wall, and two people who’ve never done anything like this got it installed, completely without leaks, after just one cheap trip to the hardware store. I now have a functioning utility sink faucet and I’m thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: kjpen

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We had a very standard Home Depot, off-the-shelf facet. The handle kept stripping. We bought this and installed it and it is sooo much better than the off-the-shelf faucet. Prettier, sturdier, smoother. It is a bit off a stretch installing... you've got to get the two handles to align to your particular holes. It's made to adjust, but it's pretty exacting. That said, we got it done and love the look and performance of this faucet!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Fila

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: After a very simple installation, I find that the spout is a loose fit in the faucet body. The supplied o-rings and white plastic retainer and properly seated in their grooves, and the spout it tightened correctly, but the spout is still loose and has a very slight leak while the water is running. It doesn't leak while turned off, so I suppose it's a minor concern. Proof, again, that you get what you pay for. When will I ever learn?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple and affordable.  Will take the Danco garden hose adapter.
customer_reviews.text: As a basic utility faucet you can't beat the price. However, I got it with the intention of replacing the aerator with a hose end adapter. Apparently the aerator doesn't have standard threads. Updated. Teflon tape and a little struggle and whatever was up with the threads on the spout got straightened out and now the hose adapter goes on easy. A tiny leak at the brass water supply needed extra Teflon tape as well. Now I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  Excellent Customer Service, too!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shower set-up for bathing my dog. The on/off switch takes some getting used to in order to operate it one-handed, but it works great with no leaks. Very easy to install the system, the hose doesn't kink and is a perfect length. I ordered the shower kit, not knowing there is a different kit for a sink faucet, and the company worked with me to get me what I needed. I haven't seen customer service that good in a while! I would definitely recommend this product and would buy it again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have it installed for a 2 weeks before the spout started leaking. There is no way to tighten, replace, or install 0 rings. junk...wasted my money, plus when I wrote the seller he never replied......I wouldn't touch this piece of junk if it were free.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Old worn out & long out of style Delta wall mount no longer available.
customer_reviews.text: House built in the 50s. Same Delta wall mount no longer available (fine with that). Bought this beautiful Peerless (evidently the company that made Delta) after reading reviews & called my plumber to install. He was pleasantly surprised, remarking that the last wall mount faucet he did (different brand) was a nightmare to install...but this one was done in no time. Asked me for the model info, etc. for future use.
customer_reviews.author: JBPI

customer_reviews.title: Very smooth handles
customer_reviews.text: My kitchen faucet was very short and difficult to wash dishes with. I bought this as a replacement. It was very easy to install (took me longer to find the shut off valve!) and is a lot better than the previous one. The handles turn very smoothly and the water stream has perfect pressure and size.
customer_reviews.author: siamak

customer_reviews.title: Connects to other wall spacers
customer_reviews.text: Our piped are a bit too far apart coming out of the wall, but we were able to use the connectors from our old cheap faucet to connect to these. I like that the handles are out of the way. We attached our own pivoting aerator. It works, turns on and off smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: A. De la Poterie

customer_reviews.title: Great lead free wall mount faucet.
customer_reviews.text: Instead of spending thousands on a complete remodel of my 60 year old kitchen I purchased this faucet to replace another one that was leaking and didn't look anywhere as good and probably was adding lead to my water. Almost all faucets out there are deck mounted. Wall mounted ones are so old style the companies mostly stopped making them I guess. Thought about buying another type that had a hose attached sprayer and was fancier but cost was over $200 and didn't say anything about being lead compliant with California law or said didn't meet requirements. I don't use a dishwasher so the sprayer hose would hang in the sink in the way. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna12

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect and beautiful! Was a breeze to install. It took care of the water hammer sound. Great product. You won't be disappointed. Fits perfect in out 1927 bungalow home .
customer_reviews.author: steve cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for good price
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy and you can tell made from quality materials. This replaced a more expensive but crappy quality faucet I bought off Amazon that lasted only a couple months. Overall I am very pleased with the look, feel, and water pressure from this faucet.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Mounting hardware and waterline hook up is not included
customer_reviews.text: While the faucet looks nice, I’ve yet to be able to install it. It does not come with any mounting hardware. You cannot mount it to the sink or hook it up to normal water lines. You have to purchase wall mount adaptors separately to mount it to the sink and be able to hook up the water lines.
customer_reviews.author: Mike T

customer_reviews.title: Old wall mount system
customer_reviews.text: There is a limited choice in this old wall mount system, but I am very satisfied with my selection of the Peerless faucet. It is attractive and beautifully functional system that I am happy to have purchased. It also didn't hurt that it was very well priced for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: MBZ

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, looks more expensive than what the price ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought five of them for rentals , using four of them , one for back up parts in case of failure of any part , with lifetime replacement parts ,no problem just can't have people without sink waiting for parts , Easy install , looks more expensive than what the price paid , adjustable flanges makes it a nice , really simple install. I installed all four of them in about 1 hour . Do not overtighten where rubber gasket is or it will leak.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great looks and high quality
customer_reviews.text: great looks and high quality. my local home depot didnt have many wall mount faucets available, i think they had two. this is much nicer and cheaper than either of their options. i purchased two different sets a couple of years apart and both are perfect. compared to compression fittings these new faucets are so easy to turn on and off! no drips either
customer_reviews.author: Art Vandalay

customer_reviews.title: The handles become loose
customer_reviews.text: I liked the faucet, but about 6 months after installation, the handles loosened up, wigging on their post - both hot and cold. We've had to tighten them both up, only for them to do it again within days. We're disappointed with the long-term performance, especially since we've only had it for a yearn Looks like we'll be replacing it.
customer_reviews.author: Denessel M. Compton

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: If I hadn't already installed it, I would return it and buy a better faucet. The biggest issue is the handles feel like cheap plastic. What's worse is that the handles wobble when turning on and off, and it's not a matter of tightening them. It seems to be part of the design. Disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Eckmando

customer_reviews.title: A fancy-schmancy look for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Bye-bye crusty old faucet from the dawn of indoor plumbing! This was a beautiful upgrade for my 1930's kitchen. It's a great faucet for the price & I would recommend it. I had a handy person install it for me (I'm soooooo posh) only because I couldn't get the dang old crusty faucet out. But once that steel relic was removed, this shiny new faucet seemed to install pretty easily. Plus it came with the purrfect sized adapter for my cute little apartment-sized dishwasher! What what!
customer_reviews.author: Curls

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: This faucet was easy to install, and the trim rings are threaded on, so they screw right up against the wall for a finished look. Our house is older, and it looks like this fixture has always been on our sink.
customer_reviews.author: 02 FOOL!

customer_reviews.title: Great Wall Mount Faucet For The Money
customer_reviews.text: Living in an older home, I was limited with the wall mount sinks in the price range I was looking for. I saw this unit was highly rated on Amazon, and decided to purchase it. I am sure glad I did! Installation was easy, the instructions were very clear (even a little humorous in parts), and installation took all of maybe five minutes. It is adjustable, it should fit most mounting situations. I plan on purchasing a second one for my laundry room sink.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: New out of Box steady drip easy replacement
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace Faucet with steady fast drip, found it couldn't be repaired. So ordered this one to replace it. It arrived on Friday installed it Saturday. New faucets shouldn't have a steady slow drip. Received replacement install it and it works great no dripping no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs to ship with washers!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Perfect fit. Only one problem there were no rubber washers. It takes the same washers as a garden hose. Could not fine them with faucet washers. It takes 4 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Greenwood

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I've installed this very good quality fixture in the sink for my outdoor kitchen that gets a lot of use. I've had it installed for some time now and I'm very pleased with the purchase. It looks great, has a superb smooth action and works very well. I wish I had found this one originally for my outdoor kitchen. Great quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Don Hamel

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Good deal
customer_reviews.text: The faucet is great. The collar at the base of the neck doesn't hold the neck very well, and it's a little loosey goosey. The handles are lightweight and feel like they may be a weak point but time will tell. The finish is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I found an old high-backed farmhouse sink for the laundry room in our new house. I wanted a nice and heavy faucet, but nothing extravagant or over-priced was needed. This unit was installed and the fit the look I wanted exactly. The faucet head swivels from side to side so I can move it entirely out of the way when I need to set a bucket in the sink, which is shallower than a typical sink. It looks very sharp and the quality is very high. Highly recommend this faucet.

customer_reviews.title: well made but high price tag

customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to use on an outdoors sink. It's been used all summer, has been in the elements, and still looks and functions well

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to set up!

customer_reviews.text: Great facet if your plumbing exits above the sink, like in most if not all mid century homes in California.

customer_reviews.title: Great wall-mounted faucet
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this faucet as a replacement for our old broken Delta wall-mounted kitchen faucet. It is a welcomed improvement in our kitchen and due to the arched faucet we can now wash much larger pots in our sink! We also love the fact that it meets lead-free guidelines. It looks great too and was very easy to install due to it's adaptability.

customer_reviews.title: It's absolutely horrible.
customer_reviews.text: I received this faucet on September 21st. It was installed on Sept 24th. From Sept 24th until today, I have replaced the "guts" of the knobs 4 times. It usually starts out as a slow drip, but then leads up to pouring water. It's absolutely horrible.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking faucet

Good quality, very smooth moving from left to right to get it out of the way for when washing large pots. I haven't had any leaking, and makes my kitchen look so much nicer.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and beautiful

customer_reviews.title: It works great, just didn't get the water pressure we were ...
customer_reviews.text: One thing that is not mentioned is that the valve size on this is smaller- it is not professional or industrial sized. It works great, just didn't get the water pressure we were use to. I guess we get to conserve water.

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: This faucet seems to be a descent quality faucet and it wasn't hard to install. I like that the valves are a positive on or off with little effort like a modern faucet should be. This faucet replaced an old style faucet where the harder you turned the handle, the better the seal. This one is 90 deg full on and back off with no physical effort. My only concern is that it feels as if someone were to strong arm the levers that they might easily break.
